source: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_SEQ_00<tab>Drydox's capital relocation plan has run into some early difficulties.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_SEQ_00<tab>イディルシャイアのドライドクスは、新米ゴブリン族の心配をしているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_SEQ_01<tab>Drydox tells you of plans afoot to move the capital of the new goblin republic from Idyllshire to the abandoned buildings of the Answering Quarter. However, the goblin she has sent to survey the site, a novice by the name of Boomshox, has yet to return. She bids you to head into the Dravanian hinterlands and check on Boomshox's safety.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_SEQ_01<tab>ドライドクスは、シャーレアン学士街を住処として利用できるか計画しているそうだ。低地ドラヴァニアのシャーレアン学士街へ、調査に向った新米ゴブリン族「ブームショクス」の様子を見に行こう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_SEQ_02<tab>You find Boomshox alive and well, yet distinctly disgruntled. She is keen to conclude her survey as quickly as possible, but the local wildlife insist on interfering with her work. She asks you to slay five crawlers in the vicinity of the Answering Quarter, so that she might finish her fieldwork in peace.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_SEQ_02<tab>ブームショクスと話した。ブームショクスは、はやくイディルシャイアに戻りたいと思っているが、そのための調査のノルマが達成できていないらしい。シャーレアン学士街で、調査の邪魔になる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E1301 /var>」を5体討伐しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_SEQ_03<tab>You slay the crawlers, making the local area safer for mapmaking goblins. Return to Boomshox to report your success.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E1301 /var>を討伐した。シャーレアン学士街の「ブームショクス」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_SEQ_04<tab>Boomshox is pleased to hear of your victory over the crawlers and pledges to resume her fieldwork with renewed vigor. There is still much and more to be surveyed, but the sooner she completes her work, the sooner she can return home to Idyllshire.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_SEQ_04<tab>ブームショクスに報告した。これで調査を進めることができるようだ。まだまだノルマは残っているようだが、悲願の達成はいつになるのだろうか。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Boomshox in the Answering Quarter.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_TODO_00<tab>シャーレアン学士街のブームショクスと話す

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_DRYDOX_000_000<tab>Gobbies think of moving capital of gobbieland to Answering Quarter. Lots of good stonehuts there, but no gobbie knows which ones stand up and which ones fall down. That why Drydox send freshface to investigate.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_DRYDOX_000_000<tab>「学士街」への　移住計画　只今　検討してるとこ
そのため　新米　送り出し　現地調査に向かわせた～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_DRYDOX_000_001<tab>But freshface been gone long, long time, and still not back. Will uplander go to Answering Quarter and check on freshface, name of Boomshox? Drydox hope Boomshox not hurt...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_DRYDOX_000_001<tab>ところがなんと　帰ってこない
困ってないか　冒険者　「学士街」で　見てきてほしい
新米の名　「ブームショクス」　どうかどうか　お願いよ～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_DRYDOX_000_010<tab>Boomshox been gone long, long time, checking stonehuts in Answering Quarter. Too long for goodthink of Drydox. Will uplander look for Boomshox and make sure she's all right?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_DRYDOX_000_010<tab>ところがなんと　帰ってこない
困ってないか　冒険者　「学士街」で　見てきてほしい
新米の名　「ブームショクス」　どうかどうか　お願いよ～！

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_BOOMSHOX_000_020<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
To see uplander in Answering Quarter is bigeyes! Drydox sends you to check on Boomshox?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_BOOMSHOX_000_020<tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
ヒトが　来るとは　めずらしい～！
ゴブの様子を　見にきたの～？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_BOOMSHOX_000_021<tab>Boomshox no like checkwork─want to finish quickfast and go home to Idyllshire, but checkwork going snailfast...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_BOOMSHOX_000_021<tab>実は　調査が　進んでない～！
早くノルマを　達成し　イディルシャイア　戻りたい～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_BOOMSHOX_000_022<tab>Every time Boomshox try to check stonehuts, creepycrawly badbugs chase away. No can mapmake with badbugs about! ...Will uplander kill five badbugs? Then Boomshox can mapmake in notloud!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_BOOMSHOX_000_022<tab>調査の邪魔する　「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E1301 /var>」
5匹ほどを　倒してほしい～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_BOOMSHOX_000_030<tab>Big, bad crawlybugs stop Boomshox doing checkwork. If uplander gets rid of crawlybugs, Boomshox can mapmake quickfast!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_BOOMSHOX_000_030<tab>調査の邪魔する　「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E1301 /var>」
5匹ほどを　倒してほしい～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_DRYDOX_000_031<tab>Has uplander found Boomshox yet? Boomshox is gobbie freshface, doing checkwork in Answering Quarter, but she been gone too long for goodthink of Drydox. If uplander find Boomshox, tell her to hurry up checkwork and quickfinish!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_DRYDOX_000_031<tab>ところがなんと　帰ってこない
困ってないか　冒険者　「学士街」で　見てきてほしい
新米の名　「ブームショクス」　どうかどうか　お願いよ～！

source:
TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_BOOMSHOX_000_040<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Thank you for deathmaking crawlybugs, uplander!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_BOOMSHOX_000_040<tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
お邪魔虫の「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20E1301 /var>」　倒してくれたの　ありがたい～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_BOOMSHOX_000_041<tab>Now Boomshox can quickfinish checkwork, and homego to Idyllshire!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_BOOMSHOX_000_041<tab>これで　調査が進みそう～！
早くノルマを　達成し　やることやって　戻りたい～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_DRYDOX_000_050<tab>Uplander find Boomshox? Then tell her to hurry with her checkwork! Boomshox is a slow gobbie, even for a freshface...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ827_01957_DRYDOX_000_050<tab>ところがなんと　帰ってこない
困ってないか　冒険者　「学士街」で　見てきてほしい
新米の名　「ブームショクス」　どうかどうか　お願いよ～
